testcase.name: runScenario

failure.message:
Found 5 accessibility violations: 1) Text of buttons and links should not be repeated in the image alternative: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/image-redundant-alt?application=axeAPI a) ["a[aria-label=\"ACs\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
b) ["a[aria-label=\"Refrigerators\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
c) ["a[aria-label=\"Televisions\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
d) ["a[aria-label=\"Washing\\ machines\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
e) ["a[aria-label=\"Cleaning\\ essentials\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
f) ["a[aria-label=\"Immunity\\ \\&\\ healthcare\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
g) ["a[aria-label=\"Women\\'s\\ personal\\ care\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
h) ["a[aria-label=\"Men\\'s\\ grooming\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
i) ["a[aria-label=\"Measuring\\ instruments\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
j) ["a[aria-label=\"Medical\\ supplies\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
k) ["a[aria-label=\"Clothing\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
l) ["a[aria-label=\"Footwear\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
m) ["a[href=\"/b?node=2563504031\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
n) ["a[aria-label=\"BAGS\\ \\&\\ LUGGAGE\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
o) ["a[aria-label=\"Women\\'s\\ Clothing\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
p) ["a[aria-label=\"Footwear\\+Handbags\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
q) ["#z6n9alpsYxoNJYxqQoK5yA > .a-cardui-body > .grid-row-2.a-section > .quadrant-container-0.quadrant-container.a-spacing-none > .image-redirect.aok-block[aria-label=\"Watches\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
r) ["a[aria-label=\"Fashion\\ jewellery\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
s) ["a[href=\"/b?node=26221348031\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
t) ["a[href=\"/b?node=26221349031\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
u) ["a[href=\"/b?node=26221350031\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
v) [".image-redirect.aok-block[href=\"/b?node=1388977031\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
w) ["a[aria-label=\"Smart\\ bulb\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
x) ["a[aria-label=\"Echo\\ devices\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
y) ["a[aria-label=\"Smart\\ Plug\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
z) ["a[href=\"/l/22649649031\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
aa) ["a[aria-label=\"Top\\ chart\\ games\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
ab) ["a[aria-label=\"Play\\ like\\ a\\ pro\\ \\|\\ Accessories\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
ac) ["a[aria-label=\"Virtual\\ reality\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
ad) ["a[aria-label=\"Kindle\\ Paperwhite\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
ae) ["a[aria-label=\"All-New\\ Kindle\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
af) ["a[aria-label=\"Kindle\\ Oasis\\ \\(9th\\ Gen\\)\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
ag) ["a[aria-label=\"Kindle\\ Paperwhite\\ 4G\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains <img> element with alt text that duplicates existing text
2) Form elements should have a visible label: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/label-title-only?application=axeAPI a) ["#searchDropdownBox"] Fix all of the following: Only title used to generate label for form element
3) Links must have discernible text: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/link-name?application=axeAPI a) ["a[href$=\"ref=footer_logo\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text
Fix any of the following: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation" Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none"
4) Page must contain a level-one heading: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading
5) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/region?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks
expected [true] but found [false]
